author: oalexeev
msg: Add 'formatKey' attribute. Developer can specify with this attribute key to search format string in application resources. Additional changes - refactor code of formatValue() method, add ability to process default format string from resources for  java.util.Date datatype, insert 'sql' string to all default keys to search format strings for java.sql.Date, java.sql.Time, java.sql.Timestamp datatypes in resources.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: The getJavascriptBegin method always appended the methods even if it was null.  Now it has the Javascript return true if there aren't any Javascript validation methods to perform.

author: husted
msg: Add InvokeAction and CreateActionForm methods to allow direct
chaining of Actions, per discussions on DEV list.

author: husted
msg: Add ContextHelper to action package, and
corresponding support for the class to Action and ActionServlet.  See Bugzilla issue #5395.
